@mbharat44036275 Kindly note that SpiceJet follows a dynamic pricing structure whereby the fares vary as per the seat availability per flight. We only have a certain number of seats available for a specific price, and once those are purchased, the next available fare is released.

@ANOOP2710 Anoop, please confirm if this was reported to our staff on arrival. If so, please DM us the complaint copy so we may check this.

@ASHWANI011292 Hi Ashwani, drones are only allowed in check-in baggage. The batteries must be removed and can be carried as hand baggage only. The battery terminals should be insulated to avoid any unintentional short circuit. The maximum watt hour of the battery must not exceed 160 WH.
